title: Julio Iglesias, Lion King, Carla's Reality Update, JAB Fundraiser and more.
itunes:title: Julio Iglesias, Lion King, Carla's Reality Update, JAB Fundraiser and more.
description:
Happy Thursday and welcome to the baddest radio show in the land!  The crew open up and talk about crime dramas.  They also discuss the things that are hard to find like a good mechanic.  Julio Iglesias has been proven via DNA test to be the father of a 43 year old man.  A Houston doctor was issued an apology from American Airlines for being forced to cover up her attire.  Beyonce and Blue Ivy were stunning at the Lion King movie premiere.  J. Anthony Brown will have a fundraiser for Leukemia July 30th.  Watch out there now!  Miss Carla covers Real Housewives of Potomac and Candiace is the center of Reality Update.  We also give The Steve Harvey Nation a PSA for our folks in the New Orleans area.  Today in J's What did you learn today segment, we find out who the second richest cast member is on the show and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
